'''No Honor Among Thieves''' is a basic [[commission]] quest.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of [[Treasure Hoarders]] have made camp in the wilderness and are up to no good. Defeat them to put an end to this threat.}}
#Defeat all enemies.

==Notes==
* Unlike most quests, where reinforcement waves spawn after all enemies have been defeated, most versions of this commission spawn reinforcements after any 3 enemies have been defeated.

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}
